title.content: At which house number is Mike hiding?

clue1.content: The world-famous forger, Mike Sunny, is spending phony money all over town!

clue2.content: Mike visits towns and leaves his false notes as he shops.

clue3.content: During his shopping sprees, Mike becomes confused, and sometimes lost.

clue4.content: To help him keep track of where heâ€™s going, Mike follows a certain pattern.

clue5.content: The pattern is formed by the street numbers of the places Mike visits. The trick is to figure out the pattern and stop him in his tracks!

clue6.content: The mysterious money trail began this morning, when Ben called from his Bike Shop on number 64. Someone paid with a funny twenty-pound note!

clue7.content: The second call reporting funny money was from the Tip-Top Hat Shop on number 49. A man was just there who bought a blue hat. The shopkeeper looked carefully at the money and realized it was fake!

clue8.content: After he bought the hat, Mike visited the Short Step Shoe Store on number 36. He bought a pair of grey shoes with his counterfeit cash.

clue9.content: After his shopping spree Mike was hungry. He went to Speedy Gonzales Fish and Chips Shop on number 25.

clue10.content: After dinner Mike went to hide in one of the houses.
